argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | addlsub.a | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | addlsub.b | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | addlsub.c | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_addlsub | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) = C <-> A = ( C - B ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_addrsub | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) = C <-> B = ( C - A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_bitr3d | |- ( ph -> ( A = ( C - B ) <-> B = ( C - A ) ) ) |
